terms: **The Consultant acknowledges that the Consultant has carefully read and understands this Release, that the Consultant has the right to consult an attorney with respect to its provisions and that this Release has been entered into voluntarily. The Consultant acknowledges that no representation, statement, promise, inducement, threat or suggestion has been made by any of the Released Parties to influence the Consultant to sign this Release except such statements as are expressly set forth herein or in the Separation Agreement.**
